28/*
29 * draft-ietf-secsh-filexfer-01.txt
30 */
31
32/* version */
33#define SSH2_FILEXFER_VERSION 3
34
35/* client to server */
36#define SSH2_FXP_INIT 1
37#define SSH2_FXP_OPEN 3
38#define SSH2_FXP_CLOSE 4
39#define SSH2_FXP_READ 5
40#define SSH2_FXP_WRITE 6
41#define SSH2_FXP_LSTAT 7
42#define SSH2_FXP_STAT_VERSION_0 7
43#define SSH2_FXP_FSTAT 8
44#define SSH2_FXP_SETSTAT 9
45#define SSH2_FXP_FSETSTAT 10
46#define SSH2_FXP_OPENDIR 11
47#define SSH2_FXP_READDIR 12
48#define SSH2_FXP_REMOVE 13
49#define SSH2_FXP_MKDIR 14
50#define SSH2_FXP_RMDIR 15
51#define SSH2_FXP_REALPATH 16
52#define SSH2_FXP_STAT 17
53#define SSH2_FXP_RENAME 18
54#define SSH2_FXP_READLINK 19
55#define SSH2_FXP_SYMLINK 20
56
57/* server to client */
58#define SSH2_FXP_VERSION 2
59#define SSH2_FXP_STATUS 101
60#define SSH2_FXP_HANDLE 102
61#define SSH2_FXP_DATA 103
62#define SSH2_FXP_NAME 104
63#define SSH2_FXP_ATTRS 105
64
65#define SSH2_FXP_EXTENDED 200
66#define SSH2_FXP_EXTENDED_REPLY 201
67
68/* attributes */
69#define SSH2_FILEXFER_ATTR_SIZE 0x00000001
70#define SSH2_FILEXFER_ATTR_UIDGID 0x00000002
71#define SSH2_FILEXFER_ATTR_PERMISSIONS 0x00000004
72#define SSH2_FILEXFER_ATTR_ACMODTIME 0x00000008
73#define SSH2_FILEXFER_ATTR_EXTENDED 0x80000000
74
75/* portable open modes */
76#define SSH2_FXF_READ 0x00000001
77#define SSH2_FXF_WRITE 0x00000002
78#define SSH2_FXF_APPEND 0x00000004
79#define SSH2_FXF_CREAT 0x00000008
80#define SSH2_FXF_TRUNC 0x00000010
81#define SSH2_FXF_EXCL 0x00000020
82
83/* statvfs@openssh.com f_flag flags */
84#define SSH2_FXE_STATVFS_ST_RDONLY 0x00000001
85#define SSH2_FXE_STATVFS_ST_NOSUID 0x00000002
86
87/* status messages */
88#define SSH2_FX_OK 0
89#define SSH2_FX_EOF 1
90#define SSH2_FX_NO_SUCH_FILE 2
91#define SSH2_FX_PERMISSION_DENIED 3
92#define SSH2_FX_FAILURE 4
93#define SSH2_FX_BAD_MESSAGE 5
94#define SSH2_FX_NO_CONNECTION 6
95#define SSH2_FX_CONNECTION_LOST 7
96#define SSH2_FX_OP_UNSUPPORTED 8
97#define SSH2_FX_MAX 8
98
99struct passwd;
100
101int sftp_server_main(int, char **, struct passwd *);
102void sftp_server_cleanup_exit(int) __attribute__((noreturn));
103
